Class StringColumn

java.lang.Object
com.tablr.model.Column<String>
com.tablr.model.StringColumn
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public final class StringColumn extends Column<String>
Represents a column that stores String values. This class extends the abstract Column class and provides specific behavior for String values.

  • Field Summary

    • isValidValue

      public boolean isValidValue(String value)
      Validates whether the provided value is valid for this column. A valid String value must not be null or empty unless blank values are allowed.
      Specified by:
      isValidValue in class Column<String>
      Parameters:
      value - The value to validate.
      Returns:
      True if the value is valid, false otherwise.

    • canAcceptAllValuesFrom

      public boolean canAcceptAllValuesFrom(Column<?> source)
      Description copied from class: Column
      Checks whether this column can accept all values and the default value from another column. Used to determine if conversion is possible.
      Specified by:
      canAcceptAllValuesFrom in class Column<String>
      Parameters:
      source - The column whose values are to be checked for compatibility.
      Returns:
      True if all values and the default value can be accepted, false otherwise.
